document_title: Delayed menstruation (late menstruation): Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
Treatment for delayed menstruation depends on the cause found. In some cases, doctors may instruct women to use birth control pills or hormone therapy to restart the menstrual cycle. If your period is late due to thyroid or thyroid disease, it can be treated medically. If there is a tumor or blockage, surgery may be performed.
Note that women need to consult a doctor for instructions on properly treating delayed menstruation. Absolutely do not arbitrarily use medicine or any rumored folk treatment method because it can make menstrual disorders worse.
